  how was this made

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

This site was made with [`distill`](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/), tables scraped from googlesheets [measures](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hv7pkBGu8XQQOIBbBt1_1LvKGBR7zTdQYCzogrv3hz0/edit?usp=sharing), and [dontpanic](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FBzrWdlRX0IjiQSoamwx6-Ib22FUMEUmxvaSwfIj0Gg/edit?usp=sharing), using [`googlesheets::`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/googlesheets/vignettes/basic-usage.html) and cleaned with the [`tidyverse::`](https://www.tidyverse.org/).
